description: OpenTelemetry Spans dashboard for avapigw API Gateway - trace search, service graph, and span metrics

panels.description: Search for traces by service name. Click a trace ID to view the full trace waterfall.
panels.title: Recent Traces

panels.description: Service dependency graph generated from trace data. Shows request flow between services.
panels.title: Service Dependency Graph

panels.description: Request rate derived from span metrics generated by Tempo
panels.title: Span Request Rate (by operation)

panels.description: Error rate derived from span metrics — percentage of spans with error status
panels.title: Span Error Rate (by operation)

panels.description: Total span throughput — all spans received by Tempo
panels.title: Span Throughput by Status

panels.description: Span duration percentiles (p50, p90, p99) from Tempo span metrics
panels.title: Span Duration Percentiles (Server)

panels.description: Span duration percentiles broken down by operation name
panels.title: p95 Span Duration by Operation

panels.description: HTTP span rate broken down by request method from span attributes
panels.title: HTTP Spans by Method

panels.description: HTTP span rate broken down by response status code from span attributes
panels.title: HTTP Spans by Status Code

panels.description: Average HTTP span duration by operation (URL path)
panels.title: Avg HTTP Span Duration by Path

panels.description: gRPC span rate broken down by service and method from span attributes
panels.title: gRPC Spans by Service/Method

panels.description: gRPC span duration percentiles from span metrics
panels.title: gRPC Span Duration Percentiles

panels.description: gRPC error rate from span metrics — percentage of gRPC spans with error status

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (rpc_service) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service="$service", rpc_system="grpc", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (rpc_service) (rate(traces_spanmetrics_calls_total{service="$service", rpc_system="grpc"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: gRPC Error Rate by Service

panels.description: Operator span rate — configuration updates, snapshots, heartbeats, etc.
panels.title: Operator Span Rate

panels.description: Operator span duration — p50 and p95 for operator operations
panels.title: Operator Span Duration

panels.description: Rate of spans accepted by the OTEL Collector receiver vs exported to Tempo
panels.title: Collector Span Pipeline

panels.description: Exporter queue size and batch processor metrics
panels.title: Collector Queue & Batch

list.description: Minimum span duration filter for trace search
list.label: Min Duration
list.name: min_duration

title: avapigw - OTEL Spans
